title: Photoshop Image Editing Genius Guide - Volume 2
description:
The expert techniques needed to instantly improve your images.

Photoshop is a staple part of any creative toolset, whether you're producing high-key product shots for a client, professionally retouching a set of commercial portraits, or working to develop your own artistic style by exploring new ways of transforming your images into art. Its applications are endless, and with each new release of the Adobe Creative Suite we are excited to discover the brand new Photoshop features that quickly become indispensable to our own workflows. 

This Genius Guide has been revised to bring it right up to date with CS6, including the super-intelligent Content-Aware options, and also teach you about everything from commercial lighting to retro styles, reshaping facial features to Draganising portraits, and much, much more. 

Featuring : Editing and enhancement - Learn the essentials and discover the standard industry practicesRestoration and effects - Rescue old and time-worn photos, and discover how to recreate modern styles Retouching and creative editing - Banish blemishes and smooth out skin perfectly, then turn your image into art Tools - Get to grips with the crucial tools in your Photoshop kit bag.

If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking to add the finishing touches to your images, this is the book for you. Helping master all the techniques and tools of Photoshop, this will guide you through the processes involved in retouching, restoring and improving any image.
